mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARKING_RESERVATION WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parking_no} AND STATUS IN ('Y','승인','취소','완료','거절')
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE +1
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 7
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 30
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 90
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 180
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 365

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARKING_RESERVATION WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parking_no} AND STATUS = '승인'
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE +1
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 7
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 30
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 90
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 180
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 365

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARKING_RESERVATION WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parking_no} AND STATUS = 'Y'
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE +1
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 7
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 30
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 90
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 180
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 365

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARKING_RESERVATION WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parking_no} AND STATUS = '취소'
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE +1
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 7
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 30
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 90
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 180
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 365

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARKING_RESERVATION WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parking_no} AND STATUS = '완료'
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE +1
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 7
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 30
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 90
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 180
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 365

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARKING_RESERVATION WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parking_no} AND STATUS = '거절'
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE +1
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 7
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 30
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 90
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 180
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 365

SELECT PR.RES_NO,PR.RES_REQUEST_DATE,PR.RES_DATE,PR.RES_APPLY_DATE,PR.STATUS,PR.CAR_NO,PR.CANCEL_REASON,M.MEMBER_ID,M.MEMBER_NAME,M.PHONE FROM PARKING_RESERVATION PR JOIN MEMBER M ON(PR.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE PR.PARKING_NO = #{parking_no} AND PR.STATUS IN ('Y','승인','취소','완료','거절')
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE +1
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 7
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 30
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 90
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 180
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 365

SELECT PR.RES_NO,PR.RES_REQUEST_DATE,PR.RES_DATE,PR.RES_APPLY_DATE,PR.STATUS,PR.CAR_NO,PR.CANCEL_REASON,M.MEMBER_ID,M.MEMBER_NAME,M.PHONE FROM PARKING_RESERVATION PR JOIN MEMBER M ON(PR.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE PR.PARKING_NO = #{parking_no} AND PR.STATUS = '승인'
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE +1
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 7
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 30
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 90
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 180
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE - 365

SELECT PR.RES_NO,PR.RES_REQUEST_DATE,PR.RES_DATE,PR.RES_APPLY_DATE,PR.STATUS,PR.CAR_NO,PR.CANCEL_REASON,M.MEMBER_ID,M.MEMBER_NAME,M.PHONE FROM PARKING_RESERVATION PR JOIN MEMBER M ON(PR.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE PR.PARKING_NO = #{parking_no} AND PR.STATUS = 'Y'
AND RES_REQUEST_DATE <= SYSDATE +1
